tagline: Lecope is an antihistamine that prevents allergic reactions from occurring in the body. It works by blocking histamines which cause allergic reactions such as runny nose, itching and sneezing.

tagline: Amoxssium is used to treat different infections caused by bacteria such as in the respiratory tract, urinary tract, ear infections, infections in the skin and bones, etc. This medication is suitable for intravenous use.

name: Giclonak
tagline: Giclonak contains aceclofenac and paracetamol as active ingredients which gives pain relief, improvement and prevention from common ailments like arthritis, spondylitis, osteoporosis, etc.

name: MONO
tagline: Mono contains ceftriaxone taken as an injection which prevents a variety of infections in the ears, urinary tract, lungs, meningitis caused by bacteria, bones and joints, etc. This medication is suitable for I.P use and can be taken as directed by your doctor.

name: Staymeo-2.5
tagline: Staymeo is an amlodiphine tablet that is used to lower blood pressure. It also provides relief from chest pain and maintains blood flow in the body. Please check product packaging for dosage information or consult your doctor.

name: Trauxune
tagline: Trauxune contains ceftriaxone that is used to stop the growth of bacteria. It is used to treat infection in respiratory tract, skin, bones, etc. This medication is suitable for I.M and I.V use and can be taken via an injection as directed by your doctor.

name: Zayitee RB
tagline: Zayitee RB gel contains choline salicylate and benzalkonium chloride that provides relief from muscle pain, headache, fever, cold, etc. It is to be used as an antiseptic pain-relieving gel.
